Job Description:
Software development for highly secure web application in the field of e- procurement/  e- tendering/  e- auction,  being built on .net platform,  for global markets with IPR owned by the company.

The candidate should have knowledge and practical development skills relating to the following topics:

ASP.Net,  C#,  Microsoft SQL server,  AJAX,  JavaScript,  Cascading Style Sheets (CSS),  Extended Markup Language (XML). Key Skills Software developer software engineer ASP.Net C# SQL Server CSS Java ScriptXML.
